hotels.description: Hong Kong's Kowloon district is an enchanting mix of buzzing night markets, Taoist temples and leafy green public parks - explore it all from the five-star Crowne Plaza Hong Kong Kowloon East, an IHG Hotel. When you're seeking some downtime, hide away at the hotel's top-range fitness centre, indulge in a treatment at Sense of Touch spa or take a dip in the 25-metre outdoor swimming pool. When hunger strikes, there are four venues to choose from, including a sultry rooftop steakhouse.
